actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to eliminate the consumptive demand exception relating to the importation of goods made with forced labor and to clarify that forced or indentured labor includes forced or indentured child labor.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to eliminate the consumptive demand exception with respect to the prohibition on the importation of goods manufactured by forced labor or indentured labor. Includes the manufacture of goods by forced or indentured child labor within such prohibition.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to eliminate the consumptive demand exception relating to the importation of goods made with forced labor and to clarify that forced or indentured labor includes forced or indentured child labor.
